comments:
From wim@nospam.org on the VE news group:
"If i create a composite on a tab form, i cannot change the layout of this 
composite to say FillLayout. If i add the code manually, it is accepted by 
VE and the panel shows correct layout beheaviour. The properties show the 
new layout, but the properties window again does not allow changing or 
removing."

I was able to recreate this problem. Here's the stack trace from the .log:

This is a problem because of the property source adapter that wrappers the tab
items. It is being called to get the host container for switching between
layouts and the container is the TabItem instead of the Composite.
We need to fix this for not only TabFolder but for CoolBar since it also
wrappers the CoolItem with a different property source adapter.

Fixed.... changed property source adapter for TabItem and CoolItem to use a
ruled property descriptor for the super properties.

Released to HEAD... will be available in the 1.0.2 maintenance stream.
Rich, please  verify this bug on the latest 1.0.2 build. Thx...

traces.message: The feature 'controls' is not a valid feature
